actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Joyce G. McFarland.

summary.text: Deems a named deceased individual to have elected, on a specified date, to waive entitlement to his military retired pay and to receive in lieu thereof a civil service retirement annuity based on his combined military and civil service. Directs that payment of a survivor annuity based on such individual's civil service retirement annuity commence with the first month beginning after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Joyce G. McFarland.
